= |footnotes = }} Battah or Batta () is a village in eastern Libya, almost northeast of Al Marj. :During the Italian occupation it was named Oberdan,Salem el Kebti, "Libia..Maseerat al Istiqlalâ€¦Watha'iq Mahalliya wa Dawliya", Part 1, ad-Dar al-Arabiya lil Uloum Nashiroun, 1st ed., 2012, p.350. after the Italian nationalist Guglielmo Oberdan. ==References== *
